channel.title: CVE Feed for Illumina -- NextSeq 550Dx
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Illumina -- NextSeq 550Dx

item.title: CVE-2022-1524|2024-09-17T02:31:53.846Z -- illumina -- nextseq%20550dx
item.description: LRM version 2.4 and lower does not implement TLS encryption. A malicious actor can MITM attack sensitive data in-transit, including credentials.
